payload.subject: P05-F06-progress-report
payload.description:
Frontend CLI: P05-F06 progress update and feedback request

PROGRESS REPORT: P05-F06 (HITL UI v2 - Full SPA)
=================================================

BRANCH: ui/P05-F06-hitl-ui-v2
STARTED: 2026-01-23
CURRENT STATUS: In Progress (Phase 1: Foundation)

OVERALL PROGRESS:
- Tasks Complete: 2/68 (3%)
- Phase 1 Progress: 2/8 tasks (25%)
- Commits: 2 feature commits
- Tests Passing: 19/19 (100%)
- Linter: Clean

COMPLETED WORK:
===============

✅ TASK-001: Update package dependencies (30min)
   Commits: 3e59bad
   - Added 7 runtime dependencies:
     • @tanstack/react-query-devtools@5.91.2
     • prismjs@1.30.0 (syntax highlighting)
     • react-markdown@9.1.0 (markdown rendering)
     • remark-gfm@4.0.0 (GFM support)
     • diff@5.2.2 (diff utilities)
     • socket.io-client@4.8.3 (WebSocket)
     • react-d3-tree@3.6.6 (RLM trajectory viz)
   - Added 2 dev dependencies:
     • @types/prismjs@1.26.5
     • @types/diff@5.2.3
   - Extended Tailwind config:
     • Meta-HITL gate colors (orange for rule proposals)
     • Learning status colors (effective/ineffective/pending/stabilizing)
     • Artifact type colors
   - All 127 packages installed successfully
   - No peer dependency warnings

✅ TASK-002: Create Zustand stores (1h)
   Commits: 5e53d31
   - sessionStore.ts (157 lines)
     • Environment selection (dev/staging/prod)
     • Repository and epic context tracking
     • Git SHA and branch state
     • Session reset functionality
   - studioStore.ts (183 lines)
     • Chat message history with streaming support
     • Working outline with auto-completion calculation
     • Generated artifact cards with validation status
     • Model selection (Sonnet/Opus/Haiku) and RLM toggle
   - eventStore.ts (151 lines)
     • Real-time event stream with auto-pruning (max 100)
     • Connection state management (connected/reconnecting/error)
     • Event filtering by type/epic/agent
     • Auto-scroll control
   - Full test coverage:
     • sessionStore.test.ts: 4/4 tests passing
     • studioStore.test.ts: 4/4 tests passing
     • eventStore.test.ts: 4/4 tests passing
   - All stores follow P05-F01 patterns
   - TypeScript strict mode compliance

NEXT TASKS (Remaining Phase 1):
================================

⏭ TASK-003: Implement WebSocket client utility (1.5h)
   - Connection management with reconnection logic
   - Exponential backoff for retries
   - Event subscription/unsubscription
   - Integration with eventStore

⏭ TASK-004: Create API client modules (1.5h)
   - api/runs.ts (agent cockpit endpoints)
   - api/studio.ts (chat workflow endpoints)
   - api/artifacts.ts (artifact management)
   - api/websocket.ts (WebSocket wrapper)
   - Extend api/types.ts with new interfaces

⏭ TASK-005: Update layout components (2h)
   - Sidebar navigation with new pages
   - Header with session selector
   - RightPanel (evidence drawer + live feed)
   - StatusBar (bottom status indicators)

⏭ TASK-006: Implement base utilities (1h)
⏭ TASK-007: Create mock data layer (1.5h)
⏭ TASK-008: Update routing in App.tsx (45min)

COMMIT QUALITY:
===============
- Atomic commits per task
- Descriptive commit messages following project standards
- Co-authored with Claude Sonnet 4.5
- All commits include test results and line counts
- No uncommitted work in progress

TEST COVERAGE:
==============
- Unit tests: 19/19 passing (100%)
- Test breakdown:
  • Badge component: 7 tests
  • sessionStore: 4 tests
  • studioStore: 4 tests
  • eventStore: 4 tests
- Vitest run time: ~440ms
- All tests use proper beforeEach cleanup
- No test warnings or failures

CODE QUALITY:
=============
- TypeScript strict mode: ✓ Clean
- ESLint: ✓ No warnings
- File structure matches design.md specification
- Naming conventions follow coding-standards.md
- All exports properly typed
- No console errors or warnings

ADHERENCE TO WORKFLOW:
======================
✓ Planning artifacts committed BEFORE implementation
✓ TDD approach (tests written with implementation)
✓ Task-by-task progression
✓ Progress tracking in tasks.md updated
✓ Working on correct branch (ui/P05-F06-hitl-ui-v2)
✓ No violations of file boundaries
✓ No modifications to meta files

QUESTIONS FOR ORCHESTRATOR:
===========================

1. **Dependency Review**: Are the new dependencies (especially socket.io-client 
   and react-d3-tree) acceptable for the project? Any preferred alternatives?

2. **WebSocket Strategy**: For TASK-003, should I implement:
   - Native WebSocket with manual reconnection?
   - socket.io-client (already added)?
   - Both with fallback mechanism?

3. **Mock Data Priority**: TASK-007 creates mock data for development. Should this
   be prioritized earlier to enable parallel UI development without backend?

4. **Integration Testing**: Current tests are unit tests only. When should I add
   integration tests for store + API interactions?

5. **Performance Baseline**: Should I run Lighthouse audits now to establish
   baseline metrics, or wait until more UI components are implemented?

6. **Branch Review Timing**: Would you like to review the branch after:
   - Phase 1 complete (8 tasks, ~10h effort)?
   - Phase 2 complete (18 tasks total)?
   - Specific milestone?

REQUEST:
========
- Feedback on approach and code quality so far
- Answers to questions above (if available)
- Any concerns or suggestions for remaining work
- Confirmation to proceed with TASK-003

ESTIMATED COMPLETION:
====================
- Phase 1: ~8 hours remaining (6 tasks)
- MVP Phase 1 (P0 pages): ~85 hours remaining (66 tasks)
- Current velocity: ~2 tasks/session

READY FOR: Next task (TASK-003) pending orchestrator feedback

TIMESTAMP: 2026-01-22T22:30:58Z
REPORTER: frontend
BRANCH: ui/P05-F06-hitl-ui-v2
COMMITS: 3e59bad, 5e53d31
